title: Tween Workshop: Revolution!—SOLD OUT
description:
What does it mean for art to take a socially conscious role? View the exhibition Revoliutsiia! Demonstratsiia! Soviet Art Put to the Test and see how art can interact with society. Take a stand as you create your own socially mindful work.

This event is designed for tweens ages 9–12, without an accompanying adult. Tween member tickets may only be purchased using an adult membership. A consent form will be sent upon ticket purchase. Please return the form to familyprograms@artic.edu prior to the workshop.

For more information about family programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or e-mail familyprograms@artic.edu. For upcoming family programs, please visit the family programs calendar.

This workshop is SOLD OUT.
